courses.title: FitX Bootcamp
courses.description: Get into shape with our intensive bootcamp designed to torch calories and build strength.

courses.title: Strength Training
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of strength training to sculpt your body and increase muscle mass.

courses.description: Experience a full-body workout with our HIIT course, guaranteed to maximize calorie burn and improve endurance.

courses.title: Yoga for Flexibility
courses.description: Improve your flexibility and find inner peace with our guided yoga sessions suitable for all levels.

courses.title: Nutrition Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of nutrition to fuel your body and optimize your fitness results.

courses.title: Mindfulness Meditation
courses.description: Calm your mind and reduce stress with our mindfulness meditation course, perfect for enhancing overall well-being.
